NAEB HEADQUARTERS
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
TO: NAEB Board
CONFIDENTIAL
No “leaks*9, please!
FROM: H. J. Skomia
DATE: April 18, 1958
Mr. Jacobson has $500.00 for us, as our first “industrial associate" as
I think we might well call them. With this first one I trust and hope we
can get more. As discussed with Schooley, we might well establish
“Sustaining Members" at $100.00 per year (can be individuals), and
“Industrial Associates" at $500.80 - $1,000.00. With this as a lever,
we might get a considerable number.
His suggestion was that we might get more such funds and contributors
if we set it up as a “John Weiss Fund*8 or something. The attached is
my reply after thinking it over a few minutes. I need your reaction,
though — specifically on the “Weiss Fund" part.
I assume you8li all go along with his making a *'surprise88 presentation
to Burton at the luncheon on May 121
I imagine it would be better if the element of surprise were preserved;
no?
Regards,
HyJ. Skomia
Executive Director
